results.name: Triangle read by rows giving successive states of cellular automaton generated by "Rule 50".
comment: Rules #50, #58, #114, #122, #178, #179, #186, #242, #250 all give rise to this sequence.
The following sequences all have the same parity: A004737, A006590, A027052, A071028, A071797, A078358, A078446. - _Jeremy Gardiner_, Mar 16 2003
reference: S. Wolfram, A New Kind of Science, Wolfram Media, 2002; Chapter 3.

Index entries for sequences related to cellular automata
formula: a(n) = n - 1 + floor(sqrt(n)) - 2*sum_{k=1..n-1} a(k) for n >= 1. - _Benoit Cloitre_, Jan 24 2013
